description: Base class for a resource, defining self-link and meta data. Resources should use AllOf to incorporate this class.

resourceType.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) or shortname of the logical resourceType. The ResourceType catalog defines the set of allowed resourceTyps.

@self.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) of the resource (rel=self).

meta.description:
Meta-data for the resource. Mandatory if you wish to support synchronisation.
 Systems should maintain and provide meta data if at all possible.
meta.$comment: ICAR ADE working group intend meta to be required in the next major release of ADE.

location.description: Unique location scheme and identifier combination.
